bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LX (Nos 4009-4092) M.W. HASLAM and P.J. PARSONS, with contributions by G. BASTIANINI, H.M. COCKLE, J. LENAERTS, D. LÜHRMANN, K. TREU, E.G. TURNER and members of the Istituto G. Vitelli

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.note: P. Oxy. LX, 4009-4092. - I. Theological texts (4009-4011) - II. Euripides (4012-4017). - III. Menander (4018-4026). - IV. Aeschines (4027-4055). - V. Documents of the Roman and Byzantine Periods (4056-4092).
bibl.seg: COLES R.A., M.W. HASLAM and P.J. PARSONS, with contributions by G. BASTIANINI, H.M. COCKLE, J. LENAERTS, D. LÜHRMANN, K. TREU, E.G. TURNER and members of the Istituto G. Vitelli, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LX (Nos 4009-4092). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 80.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1994, 8°, xiii-258 pp. et XII pll. ISBN 0-85698-117-6. £60.

P. Oxy. LX, 4009-4092. - I. Theological texts (4009-4011) - II. Euripides (4012-4017). - III. Menander (4018-4026). - IV. Aeschines (4027-4055). - V. Documents of the Roman and Byzantine Periods (4056-4092).

C.R. par Hans-Albert Rupprecht, ZSav 113 (1996) pp. 479-482. - Jean Lenaerts, ChrEg 73 (1998) No. 145, pp. 162-168. - Bernhard Palme, Tyche 13 (1998) pp. 299-301. - G.M. Parássoglou, Hellenika 46 (1996) pp. 175-178 [concerne aussi: P. Oxy. LXI].
Coles Haslam Parsons Bastianini Cockle Lenaerts Lührmann Treu Turner
